products.title: Bella Blackout Black Roller Blind
products.description: Simple, bold and cohesive, their bella blackout black roller blind blends minimal style with practical design. A firm favourite, their bella blackout fabrics come in a wide array of colours and blind types to suit any room - whether its blackout roller blinds in the bedroom, in the kitchen or study, these blackout fabrics are durable and value for money. At swift direct blind, quality comes first.

products.title: Mirabella Solar Crush Black Solar/Thermal Perfect Fit Pleated Blind
products.description: Their mirabella collection are made from solar fabric. This means they utilize fabric technology that keeps your room warm in winter and cool in summer by absorbing heat from sunlight. This makes them an excellent choice for those who are looking for energy efficient and energy saving blinds. Featured here in their black colour - a perfect bold choice for any room that you want to dim the light in a little more.

products.title: Mirabella Solar Crush Black Solar/Thermal Pleated Blind
products.description: Product id: sdb-plf0184 fabric colour: black material: 100% polyester headrail: aluminium headrail - wide colour options available control type: cord energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes mirabella solar crush black solar/thermal pleated blind in black. Made to measure from 41. 78 with free uk mainland delivery. This solar/thermal pleated blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.

products.title: Bella Blackout Black Panel Blind
products.description: Simple, bold and cohesive, their bella blackout black panel blind blends minimal style with practical design. A firm favourite, their bella blackout fabrics come in a wide array of colours and blind types to suit any room - whether its blackout panel blinds in the bedroom, in the kitchen or study, these blackout fabrics are durable and value for money. Panel blinds are great being used to create sections in large spaces, as they can be top fixed to ceilings and can span up to a massive 5 metres width and 3 metres drop.

products.title: Bella Blackout Black Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Simple, bold and cohesive, their bella blackout black electric roller blind blends minimal style with practical design. A firm favourite, their bella blackout fabrics come in a wide array of colours and blind types to suit any room - whether its blackout electric roller blinds in the bedroom, in the kitchen or study, these blackout fabrics are durable and value for money. Due to their chain-free control options their electric roller blinds are inherently child-safe by design, and if you upgrade with the smart home hub, their electric roller blinds become controllable with your mobile phone.
